description.value:
This burgundy moss grows in heart-shaped clumps and releases a pleasant, calming scent. The spell DC of any spell cast by Activating this item is 24.

  • Armor You gain resistance 5 to mental damage and a +1 item bonus to saving throws against effects with the emotion trait.
  • Weapon After you cast a healing spell by activating the heartmoss, the weapon exudes a soothing scent. Your Strikes with the affixed weapon have the nonlethal trait for 1 minute. Until the end of your next turn, Strikes with the affixed weapon cause the target to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round if it hits (or for 3 rounds on a critical hit).

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Stabilize].

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast 3rd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal].
